EmailTemplate.name: Global_Event_SpringOne_Platform_2016.Reg is Open 3-16
EmailTemplate.subject: Registration is now open!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://2016.event.springoneplatform.io/register]]> Registration is now open <[[https://2016.event.springoneplatform.io/register]]>! Join top industry developers, operators, architects, product managers, data scientists, and executives as we gather for in-depth conversations on the current and future impact of transformative software at SpringOne Platform, at the Aria in Las Vegas August 1–4, 2016.
Keynote Speaker Adrian Cockcroft
Adrian has had a long career working at the leading edge of technology. Before joining Battery, Adrian helped lead Netflix’s migration to a large scale, highly available public-cloud architecture and the open sourcing of the cloud-native NetflixOSS platform. Adrian was a founding member of eBay Research Labs and a distinguished engineer at Sun Microsystems.
<[[https://2016.event.springoneplatform.io/register]]>
